item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign shipments and digital sales top two million in one day
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/elden-ring-nightreign-shipments-and-digital-sales-top-two-million-in-one-day

Total worldwide shipments and digital sales for Elden Ring Nightreign have surpassed two million units on its first day of release, publisher Bandai Namco and developer FromSoftware announced.

Elden Ring Nightreign launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam today.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

In Elden Ring Nightreign, players must make split-second decisions about combat and exploration across a map that can fluctuate with different biomes, weapons, and enemies in order to become stronger, and outrun the encroaching circle of fire to be able to take on terrifying bosses at the end of each day. This culminates on the third day, where if players were successful in surviving the night must take on one of the Nightlords—new bosses for this version. Nightfarers must learn to cooperate to take down these challenges, combining their unique abilities together for an unparalleled experience in the Elden Ring universe. All is not lost for those who fall in defeat. Unsuccessful runs will grant players relics to allow them to customize and upgrade their characters tailored to their personal play styles.

Key Features

  • Rise Together – Join forces with other players to take on the creeping night and the dangers within featuring three-player cooperative play.
  • Become a Hero – Take command of uniquely skilled heroes, each possessing their own abilities and distinct flair. While individually powerful, their skills grow even more formidable when united as a team.
  • Take on the Night – Overcome a relentless environmental threat that sweeps through a land that changes between each game session and defeat the magnificent boss of that night!

item.title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach – Game Premiere event set for June 8
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/death-stranding-2-on-the-beach-game-premiere-event-set-for-june-8

  • PS5

Live at the Orpheum Theatre in Los Angeles.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer Kojima Productions will host the Death Stranding 2: On the Beach – Game Premiere event at Orpheum Theatre in Los Angeles on June 8 at 7:00 p.m. PT / 10:00 p.m. ET, the companies announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube.

Hosted by Geoff Keighley, the event will celebrate the upcoming launch of Death Stranding 2: On the Beach with a panel discussion featuring director Hideo Kojima and special guests, and an exclusive live demonstration of the game.

For those who wish to attend the event in person, limited tickets are available here.

Death Stranding 2: On the Beach is due out for PlayStation 5 on June 26.
